articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Swedish President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Swedish President
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on June 1 sent a message of greeting to Carl Gustaf Xâ…¥, king of Sweden, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message wished the king good health and happiness and the Swedish people well-being.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju sends Congratulations to Finnish PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju sends Congratulations to Finnish PM
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Juha Sipila on his appointment as prime minister of the Republic of Finland.
					 The message wished the PM big success in his responsible work for the country's development and well-being of the Finnish people.
					
					 On the same day DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Timo Juhani Soini on his appointment as Finnish FM.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Accused of Blocking Joint National Events
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Accused of Blocking Joint National Events
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The North, South and Overseas Sides Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration agreed to hold joint national events as grand nationwide festivals of political significance this year marking the 15th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation and have discussed the relevant issues from the outset of this year.
					 But the south Korean puppet authorities, which have denied the joint declaration and refused to implement it, openly resorted to the moves to block the events in advance, claiming that they would decide whether to allow the events or not, according to the results of the three-way working-level contact. They interfered even in the working-level consultation among NGOs of the south for the agreement on the events and forced the south side's preparatory committees for the joint national events to change the venue of the events already agreed on and "depoliticize the events" in a desperate bid to scupper the events.
					
					 Answering to a question put by KCNA Friday in connection with it, a spokesman for the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration termed it a blatant challenge to the aspiration and desire of all Koreans for national reconciliation, unity and reunification and an unpardonable crime against the nation.
					
					 The puppet group self-exposed that it has not a slight will to implement the north-south declarations by desperately blocking the joint national events while insisting on their "non-political nature," the spokesman said, and continued:
					
					 After all, due to the deliberate moves of the puppet group, even the working-level consultation of NGOs of the north, the south and overseas came not to be held any longer and the joint national event marking the June 15 events was left with no choice but to be held separately in the north, the south and abroad.
					
					 As long as such traitors as Park Geun Hye escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north are allowed to stay in office, would there be no improved north-south relations but a war.
					
					 The puppet group will be cursed and condemned by all Koreans for scuppering the joint national events and driving the north-south relations into a catastrophe.

articles.title: Promising Girl Footballers
articles.content:
Promising Girl Footballers
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK girl footballers came first at the 2015 AFC U-14 Girl Regional Championship (East Asia).
					 Among them are Kim Ryu Song and Kim Yun Ok, who won the title of best player and the title of top scorer respectively in the championship.
					
					 Kim Ryu Song scored five goals in four matches and played a key role in opening the score in the finals.
					
					 Kim Yun Ok kicked a total of nine goals in the championship.
					
					 Both of them started football at juvenile sports schools from a few years ago, but they have proved successful in many domestic games.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Accused of Obstructing Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Accused of Obstructing Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Kwak Tong Gi, permanent researcher at Uri Institute for Social Studies, posted an article on the south Korean internet paper Saram Ilbo on May 28.
					 The article recalled that the Committees of the North, South and Overseas Sides for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration agreed to hold a national joint event marking the 15th anniversary of its publication in Seoul and open the event for observing 70th anniversary of the liberation of the country in Pyongyang.
					
					 Park is expected to be absent at the event slated to take place on June 15 under the pretence of the south Korea-U.S. summit.
					
					 Her plan to discuss the issue of tightening the alliance and triangular cooperation with the U.S. and Japan by making a trip to the U.S. on the day marking the 15th anniversary of the declaration is a blatant challenge and mockery of the declaration.

articles.title: S. Korean Civic Organization Launches Action for Peace against War
articles.content:
S. Korean Civic Organization Launches Action for Peace against War
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea staged an action for peace against war in Seoul on June 1, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 The participants noted it was fully revealed that the deployment of THAAD in south Korea poses threat to peace. 
					
					 They said the ever-escalating war moves of the U.S. forces have created such tense situation on the Korean peninsula that a war may break out any time.
					
					 They demanded the cancellation of the plan for the THAAD deployment and the earliest possible transfer of OPECON to south Korea.

articles.title: Suppression of Jongyojo by Park Geun Hye' Regime under Fire
articles.content:
Suppression of Jongyojo by Park Geun Hye' Regime under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The National Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) held a meeting in Seoul on May 30 at which it denounced the puppet authorities' suppression of Jongyojo.
					 The organization in a resolution accused the "Constitutional Court" of its recent decision on the "law on teachers union" which bans discharged teachers from joining in the union.
					
					 The resolution dismissed the decision as an anachronistic one and part of the action to kill Jongyojo.
					
					 On June 1 Jongyojo held a press conference in Seoul and expressed its will to stand up against the puppet authorities' suppression of Jongyojo in solidarity with the international community.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage War Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage War Drills
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers are staging war maneuvers under various codenames in different parts of south Korea every day to invade the north.
					 According to the south Korean Yonhap News, the 6th Corps of the Ground Force of the puppet army announced that it would stage the 2015 land cooperation drill in the area of Kyonggi Province including Phochon, Yangju and Tongduchon from June 8 to 12.
					
					 It also announced that an operation plan drill of reserve forces would be staged from June 9.
					
					 The warmongers' hysteria has gone beyond the red line.

articles.title: South Korean Paper Blasts U.S.-Japan-South Korea Confab for Cooperation in War against DPRK
articles.content:
South Korean Paper Blasts U.S.-Japan-South Korea Confab for Cooperation in War against DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- South Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on June 2 accused the U.S., Japan and south Korea of openly calling for cooperation in the war of aggression against the DPRK at the meeting of their ministers of defence.
					 The south Korean authorities reached an  agreement with outsiders to cooperate in doing harm to the compatriots in the north at the talks, the editorial noted, adding that such nexus made against the backdrop of the worst inter-Korean relations was a provocative act of escalating the military stand-off on the Korean peninsula to an extreme phase.
					
					 The editorial went on:
					
					 The authorities openly allowed Japan's ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 If the Park regime persists in tightening the military nexus with the U.S. and Japan and war moves, this will only spark off stronger resistance among all people demanding the resignation of the regime.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slams U.S. Scenario for Biochemical War
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slams U.S. Scenario for Biochemical War
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore carried an article on June 4 disclosing the dangerous scenario of the U.S. imperialist aggressors to ignite a biochemical war on the Korean peninsula at any cost.
					 The article said that there is suspicion about the test conducted by the U.S. forces present in south Korea through the introduction of anthrax germs and botulinus germs.
					
					 It noted it was disclosed that they set up institutes in Ryongsan of Seoul, Osan of Kyonggi Province and other place and have conducted experiments on the "counter system of bio-chemical warfare" according to the "Jupiter plan".

articles.title: Japan's Apology and Reparation for Sexual Slavery Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Apology and Reparation for Sexual Slavery Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held a Wednesday rally before the Japanese embassy in Seoul in demand of Japan's apology and reparation for the sexual slavery committed by the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The organization held that the Kono statement was published in 1993 to admit the responsibility for the sexual slavery committed by the Imperial Japanese Army, but the Japanese government made a verification of it. 
					
					 It continued:
					
					 In particular, the Japanese government insulted the victims of the sexual slavery by calling them "victims of flesh traffic," thus denying the state-sponsored organized crime and claiming that it was spearheaded by civilian business people.
					
					 Japan is justifying the history of its past aggression in a bid to reignite a war.

articles.title: Official of Koreans Organization in China Calls for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Official of Koreans Organization in China Calls for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration
Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Choe Se Jin, secretary general of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, released an article on June 2 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					The article said:
					
					The June 15 joint declaration serves as the most just programme for achieving national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, by the concerted efforts of the Koreans in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					The south Korean authorities should stop "cooperation" with outside forces, though belatedly, and opt for implementing the historic June 15 joint declaration as desired by all fellow countrymen in the north, the south and overseas.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Austria 
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK posted on its internet website the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" on May 31. 
					 The work, published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990), deals with the idea that the leadership of the party serves as a decisive guarantee for the victory of socialist cause, the issue of developing the WPK into a Juche-type revolutionary party and the basic ways of fulfilling the mission and duty of the party as a leading political organization.
					
					 The portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il was also posted on the website.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- A lecture took place in Tajikistan, round-table talks in Angola and an opening ceremony of the Korean books, photos and handicrafts exhibition in Peru on May 29 to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 On display in the venue of the exhibition were photos showing the party-building feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Also displayed there were works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, books and photos introducing the true picture of the DPRK and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people. 
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan said Kim Jong Il made sure that all the party members united close around Kim Il Sung in thinking and purpose and developed the WPK into the party with strong capability. 
					
					 The director of the department of social education of the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples and other speakers said Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee was of great significance in developing the WPK and accomplishing the socialist cause in Korea. 
					
					 The president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union said the Peruvian people will become to know better about the immortal exploits of the great leaders of the Korean people, brilliant culture and history of Korea and the reality of the prosperous DPRK through the exhibition marking the significant day which reminds people of the undying party-building feats of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by British Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by British Body
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website an article illustrated with photos of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 The article said that Kim Jong Un always urges all officials to place the interests of people above all. It went on:
					
					 He has devoted his all to providing the Korean people with happy life.
					
					 He has ceaselessly visited factories and farms, giving utmost priority to the demand and interests of people working there.
					
					 When he visits a unit, he learns in detail about its situation and gives on the spot clear-cut answers to problems it has.
					
					 He is energetically leading the party, state and army of the DPRK.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK to Be Celebrated in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK to Be Celebrated in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and liberation of Korea was inaugurated in Sofia on June 1.
					 Alexander Paunov, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Bulgarian Communist Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events to give wide publicity to the exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by liberating the country and building and leading the Workers' Party of Korea and the successes being made by the Korean people in their efforts for building a thriving socialist nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Anniversary of North-South Joint Declaration Observed in Guinea
articles.content:
Anniversary of North-South Joint Declaration Observed in Guinea
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- A lecture and film show took place at the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea on May 28 to observe the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The vice-director of the institute said thanks to leader Kim Jong Il's steel-strong will for achieving reunification, great caliber and magnanimity, the north-south summit, the first kind in the history of Korea's division, was held in June 2000 and the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was published.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Thanks to the joint declaration which command full support and sympathy among all Koreans, the north and the south could head for reconciliation, unity and cohesion.
					
					 The former Lee Myung Bak regime and the present Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea totally denied the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing it, and desperately worked to escalate confrontation with the compatriots in the north to plunge the north-south relations to a catastrophe.
					
					 The Korean nation will surely build a thriving reunified country in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean film "Our Country Emerging Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity."

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK to Be Observed in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK to Be Observed in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- A Bangladeshi preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the liberation of Korea was inaugurated on May 31 at the joint initiative of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), the Bangladesh Communist Party, the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, the Bangladesh People's League, the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy and the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee.
					 MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee discussed the matters on arranging colorful political and cultural events for praising the exploits and wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un to mark the significant days with splendor.

articles.title: U.S. Harsher Sanctions Compel DPRK to Further Bolster up Nuclear Force: Russian Figure
articles.content:
U.S. Harsher Sanctions Compel DPRK to Further Bolster up Nuclear Force: Russian Figure
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Vorontsov, section chief of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences, when interviewed by a broadcasting service recently, asserted that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK harasses the security on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity.
					 A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK clarified in a recent statement that the nuclear weapon of the DPRK is a deterrent for self-defence to cope with the nuclear threat and threat of military aggression posed by the U.S., he recalled, adding:
					
					 This is also ascribable to the fact that the DPRK proposed all the countries concerned, notably the U.S., Japan and south Korea, substantial dialogue so many times but such efforts for resumption of dialogue was turned down and refused by them.
					
					 In January this year Obama again revealed the U.S. scheme to invade the DPRK.
					
					 So, there is no other way for the DPRK but to concentrate its efforts on bolstering up its capability for self-defence.
					
					 To this end, the DPRK is bolstering up its nuclear deterrent.
					
					 U.S. harsher sanctions aimed at isolating the DPRK is compelling the DPRK to beef up its nuclear force.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita dia nacional de Suecia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita dia nacional de Suecia
Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia primero un mensaje de felicitacion al rey de Suecia, Carl Gustaf XVI, con motivo del Dia Nacional de este pais nordico.
					El remitente desea de todo corazon al destinatario buena salud y felicidad y al pueblo sueco el bienestar.

articles.title: Kim Ryu Song y Kim Yun Ok, sobresalientes futbolistas coreanas
articles.content:
Kim Ryu Song y Kim Yun Ok, sobresalientes futbolistas coreanas
Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ACNC) -- Figuran Kim Ryu Song y Kim Yun Ok entre las futbolistas del equipo coreano que ocupo el primer lugar en el campeonato regional (Asia Oriental) de futbol sub-14 de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol 2015.
					Kim Ryu Song marco 5 goles en 4 partidos y aporto a meter el primer gol en la final, asi que fue otorgado el premio de  mejor jugadora.
					
					Kim Yun Ok recibio el premio de mejor goleadora al meter 9 goles en total.
					
					Ellas tienen solamente la carrera futbolista de 3 anos en la Escuela Deportiva de Jovenes y Ninos Escolares.
					
					Pero, desempenaron un papel decisivo para tres triunfos de su equipo en los torneos nacionales de futbol de jovenes y ninos.
					
					Segun el entrenador Kang Song Jin, estas dos jugadoras tienen diferentes caracteres. Kim Ryu Song tiene el caracter alegre y osado y a Kim Yun Ok le gusta la musica.
					
					Ellas tienen buena sensibilidad de meter goles y buenas habilidades de drible y saque a larga distancia en comparacion de su edad y por eso forman el grueso del equipo.
					
					Los expertos y aficionados de futbol califican que son prometedoras estas jugadoras que atrajeron mucha atencion del circulo internacional de futbol a la edad de unos 10 anos.
